attributes.action: Adjust NI Contributions accordingly to those who have private medical/dental insurance so they arent paying tax twice.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Those of us that pay for private medical/dental insurance pay taxes on our insurance, we are then paying NI contributions for a service we don't use.
Our NI Contributions should be lowered to take into account we will not be using and contributing to the NHS load as well as paying for a service which also carries a tax payment.
